ARABIC: وَيَوْمَ يُنَادِيهِمْ فَيَقُولُ أَيْنَ شُرَكَآءِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمْ تَزْعُمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day when He summons them He will say, 'Where are they, those you claimed to be My associates?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Upon a day He will call them and ask: "Where are they you imagined were My compeers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Let them bear in mind) that on that Day when He will call out to them saying: "Where are My associates, those whom you imagined to be so?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God will call the unbelievers on the Day of Judgment and ask them, "Where are your idols in which you had faith?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On the day when He will call to them – He will therefore proclaim, “Where are those partners of Mine, whom you had assumed?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the Day when He will call to them, and will say: "Where are My (so-called) partners, whom you used to assert"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And on the day when He shall call them and say: Where are those whom you deemed to be My associates?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when He shall call. to them, and He shall say, 'Where now are My associates whom you were asserting?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And on the Day when He shall call unto them and say: Where are My partners whom ye pretended?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And on the Day He shall call out to them and say, "Where are those whom you alleged were My partners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And on the Day whereon He shall call unto them and say: where are My associates whom ye were wont to assert?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The day He will call out to them and say, ‘Where are My ‘partners’ that you used to claim?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Day that He will call on them, He will say: "Where are my 'partners'? whom ye imagined (to be such)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) the Day when He (your Lord Allah) will call them (those who worshipped others along with Allah), and will say: "Where are My (so-called) partners, whom you used to assert?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Upon that Day He will call to them saying: 'Now, where are those whom you alleged to be My associates'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when He will call to them, and say, “Where are My associates whom you used to claim?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are my 'partners' which you used to claim?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:74] And, mention, the day when He will call to them and say, ‘Where [now] are My associates those whom you used to claim?’ — this is mentioned again in order to expound upon it:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And on the Day) which is the Day of Judgement (when He shall call unto them and say: Where are My partners whom ye pretended) whom you claimed were My partners?
